item.title: Participative Management
item.description: Jotted this down today while reflecting on a brief conversation with an oil industry engineer. The conversation got me thinking about the subject of human resource management, which I discovered in 2001, when I first got into business studies. At that time, I discovered Peter Drucker, who became one of my favourite business management writers. I didn't know it at the time, but in his early career he wrote for the Financial Times, one of my all time favourite papers to read.
